text: Goodbye, Boys () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalik.До свидания, мальчики!До свидания, мальчики! It stars Natalya Bogunova, Yevgeny Steblov, and Anna Rodionova. == Actors == * Natalya Bogunova as Inna * Yevgeny Steblov as Volodya Belov (as Ye. Steblov) * Anna Rodionova as Katya * Nikolay Dostal as Sashka Krigger * Victoria Fyodorova as Zhenya * Mikhail Kononov as Viktor Anikin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalik
title: Goodbye, Boys
